messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Tuesday's picture writing prompt: What's gnu?
messages.msgSnippet: Oops, sorry about that. It was supposed to go to the writers list! Joyce
messages.messageBody:
Oops, sorry about that. It was supposed to go to the writers list!

Joyce



On May 2, 2006, at 4:43 AM, Joyce Fetteroll wrote:

> The picture is here:
>
> http://dragonwritingprompts.blogsome.com/2006/05/02/whats-gnu/
>
> Write a conversation between then as they're off to wherever they're
> going.
>
> Things to think about if you're stuck:
>
> Who are these guys?
> Where are they headed?
> What is their goal?
> What is their purpose?
> Are they unique in their world?
> Were they created? By who?
> Did they come from somewhere else? Where and what is it like there?
> Why did they come?
>
> Joyce

messages.subject: Tuesday's picture writing prompt: What's gnu?
messages.msgSnippet: The picture is here: http://dragonwritingprompts.blogsome.com/2006/05/02/whats-gnu/ Write a conversation between then as they re off to wherever they re going.
messages.messageBody:
The picture is here:

http://dragonwritingprompts.blogsome.com/2006/05/02/whats-gnu/

Write a conversation between then as they're off to wherever they're
going.

Things to think about if you're stuck:

Who are these guys?
Where are they headed?
What is their goal?
What is their purpose?
Are they unique in their world?
Were they created? By who?
Did they come from somewhere else? Where and what is it like there?
Why did they come?

Joyce
